texts: Team up with neighbours to get the best deal from a supplier. Businesses in Bond Street successfully set up a preferred supplier 'Buyer's Club', resulting in waste-related vehicle trips being reduced from 144 to nine per day, a 94% fall.

Aim to move deliveries outside the morning peak. A national health and beauty retailer cut journey times by 18.5%, NOx by 28%, and fuel usage by 3.2%.

Assess what is and isn't business-critical. Personal items are believed to make up 30-40% of all deliveries to workplaces. Our research tells us 67% of people are willing to use alternative collection points for personal deliveries, which can reduce traffic to your workplace.
